# processors.smoothers.dct_smooth { #fasttrackpy.processors.smoothers.dct_smooth }

`processors.smoothers.dct_smooth(x, order=5)`

A DCT Smoother

## Parameters

| Name    | Type     | Description                     | Default    |
|---------|----------|---------------------------------|------------|
| `x`     | np.array | A 1D array of values to smooth. | _required_ |
| `order` | int      | DCT Order. Defaults to 5.       | `5`        |

## Returns

| Type     | Description    |
|----------|----------------|
| Smoothed | See `Smoothed` |
